Question: What is the lexicon from hate-base.org4 used as the hate speech lexicon? (From page(s) 4)

Question: What is a word-biLSTM model that uses subwords to convert text to vectors? (From page(s) 6)
Answer: A Bidirectional Long Short TermMemory (BiLSTM) layer is applied on top of the concate-nated representations to obtain a contextual word represen-tation. Finally, a Softmax layer is applied on the word rep-resentation to obtain a probability distribution over the labelset.
